attributes.action: Ban all peanuts and foods containing peanuts from all schools where there are allergy sufferers they can kill
attributes.additional_details: Peanuts and foods containing peanuts to some children adults are life threatening .. I say and speak for thousands of sufferers to ban them in all schools.. These children could die and have died in our schools .. Because of ignorance ban all foods containing peanuts into our schools .. Save our children .. America have schools where all foods containing peanuts are banned they have peanut free schools .. Why can't we .. Please help x
